constructor.details: Initializes the Ownable contract with the deployer as the owner

onPositionUseBefore(bytes).details: Reverts if the app is not whitelisted or if the expiry is more than 24 hours in the future

params._data: Encoded data containing the app address and expiry timestamp

owner().details: Returns the address of the current owner.

registerHook(address).details: Can only be called by the contract owner

params._handler: Address of the handler contract to register with

renounceOwnership().details: Leaves the contract without owner. It will not be possible to call `onlyOwner` functions. Can only be called by the current owner. NOTE: Renouncing ownership will leave the contract without an owner, thereby disabling any functionality that is only available to the owner.

transferOwnership(address).details: Transfers ownership of the contract to a new account (`newOwner`). Can only be called by the current owner.

updateWhitelistedAppsStatus(address,bool.details: Can only be called by the contract owner

params.app: Address of the application to update
params.status: New whitelist status for the application

constructor.notice: Constructor to set up the contract

onPositionUnUseAfter(bytes).notice: Empty hook function for position unuse (after)

onPositionUnUseBefore(bytes).notice: Empty hook function for position unuse (before)

onPositionUseAfter(bytes).notice: Empty hook function for position use (after)

onPositionUseBefore(bytes).notice: Checks if a position use is allowed based on expiry time

onWildcardAfter(bytes).notice: Empty hook function for wildcard actions (after)

onWildcardBefore(bytes).notice: Empty hook function for wildcard actions (before)

registerHook(address).notice: Registers the hook with a handler contract

updateWhitelistedAppsStatus(address,bool.notice: Updates the whitelist status of an application
